mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT C_ID, C_NAME, ROUND(PRICE*0.85) AS PRICE, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM') || '-05' AS D_DATE, RCOUNT FROM COMPANY C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.M_ID=M.M_ID) JOIN ( SELECT C_ID, SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE, COUNT(O_ID) RCOUNT FROM ( SELECT PD.PD_ID, PD.PRICE, P.PA_ID, RE.R_SDATE, RE.R_EDATE, RO.R_ID, C.C_ID, C.C_NAME, RE.O_ID FROM PAY_DETAIL PD JOIN PAYMENT P ON(PD.PA_ID=P.PA_ID) JOIN RESERVATION RE ON(RE.PA_ID=PD.PA_ID) JOIN ROOM RO ON(RE.R_ID=RO.R_ID) JOIN COMPANY C ON(RO.C_ID=C.C_ID) JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.M_ID=M.M_ID) WHERE C.M_ID = #{mId} AND TO_CHAR(RE.R_EDATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMM') AND PA_ID NOT IN ( SELECT PA_ID FROM PAY_DETAIL WHERE PD_TYPE = 'R')) GROUP BY C_ID) USING(C_ID) WHERE C_ID NOT IN( SELECT C_ID FROM DEPOSIT_HISTORY WHERE TO_CHAR(D_DATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')))

SELECT C_ID, C_NAME, ROUND(PRICE*0.85) AS PRICE, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM') || '-05' AS D_DATE, RCOUNT FROM COMPANY C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.M_ID=M.M_ID) JOIN ( SELECT C_ID, SUM(PRICE) AS PRICE, COUNT(O_ID) RCOUNT FROM ( SELECT PD.PD_ID, PD.PRICE, P.PA_ID, RE.R_SDATE, RE.R_EDATE, RO.R_ID, C.C_ID, C.C_NAME, RE.O_ID FROM PAY_DETAIL PD JOIN PAYMENT P ON(PD.PA_ID=P.PA_ID) JOIN RESERVATION RE ON(RE.PA_ID=PD.PA_ID) JOIN ROOM RO ON(RE.R_ID=RO.R_ID) JOIN COMPANY C ON(RO.C_ID=C.C_ID) JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.M_ID=M.M_ID) WHERE C.M_ID = #{mId} AND TO_CHAR(RE.R_EDATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMM') AND PA_ID NOT IN ( SELECT PA_ID FROM PAY_DETAIL WHERE PD_TYPE = 'R')) GROUP BY C_ID) USING(C_ID) WHERE C_ID NOT IN( SELECT C_ID FROM DEPOSIT_HISTORY WHERE TO_CHAR(D_DATE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) ORDER BY C_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEPOSIT_HISTORY JOIN COMPANY USING(C_ID) WHERE M_ID = ${list.get(0)} AND TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= '${list.get(1)}' AND TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= '${list.get(2)}'

SELECT DH_ID, C_ID, C_NAME, COUNT(DISTINCT RESERVATION.O_ID) RCOUNT, TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') D_DATE, SUM(PRICE) PRICE FROM DEPOSIT_HISTORY JOIN COMPANY USING(C_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(C_ID) JOIN RESERVATION USING(R_ID) JOIN PAYMENT USING(PA_ID) JOIN PAY_DETAIL USING(PA_ID) WHERE COMPANY.M_ID = ${list.get(0)} AND TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= '${list.get(1)}' AND TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= '${list.get(2)}' GROUP BY DH_ID, C_ID, O_ID, C_NAME, TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY D_DATE DESC
